task.summary: 1. MVI Set up 2. can query all songs from the content provider
1. Added albumArt field to song model 2. Implemented getAlbumUri with album id 3. Added exo-player to the app level dependencies 4. Created a better layout for song item
1. Completed song list feature 2. Added Media session service 3. Partial implementation of media styled notification
1. Finished building notification for player 2. Added actions for play,pause,next,previous
1. Added a base fragment for all activity that have a fragment 2. Built out the basic player view 3. added observable to listen to clicks from song list
1. Added a duration converter 2. static class for circularMusicViewFragment
1. Created a base playback view for all fragment to implement 2. Moved notification handling to a different class 3.
